events.message: I received my order last week, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's request involves a refund for a product they are dissatisfied with and want to initiate the return process.
Assigning customer support agent Sarah to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund. I'll assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let me know if the product was opened or used?
The order number is 123456789, and the product packaging was opened but it has not been used yet.
Thank you for the information. We can start the refund process immediately. Please ship the product back using the prepaid return label we will send shortly.
That sounds great, thanks! I will look out for the return label email and send the product back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned product and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your quick and helpful support!
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
